类 Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.model.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.model.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.model.plane.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.model.plane.Boss
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
Represents the Boss enemy in the game.

The Boss features unique abilities, including a shield and patterned vertical movement. It can fire multiple types of projectiles and has significantly more health than standard enemies.

Key features:

  • Randomized vertical movement within specified bounds.
  • Shield mechanics to temporarily block damage.
  • Multi-directional projectile firing.

This class extends FighterPlane to inherit basic movement and damage handling.

作者:
[Xia si zhe]

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the Boss's position based on its movement pattern and ensures it stays within bounds.
      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the Boss's state, including position and shield mechanics.
      指定者:
      updateActor 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireProjectiles()
      Fires three projectiles: upward, straight, and downward. This is upgrade for boss attack mode
      返回:
      A list of projectiles fired by the Boss

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      从类复制的说明: FighterPlane
      Abstract method for firing projectiles.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define how the plane fires projectiles.

      指定者:
      fireProjectile 在类中 FighterPlane
      返回:
      A projectile instance or null if no projectile is fired

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Reduces the Boss's health if it is not shielded.
      指定者:
      takeDamage 在接口中 Destructible
      覆盖:
      takeDamage 在类中 FighterPlane

      private void initializeMovePattern()

    • updateShield

      private void updateShield()
      Updates the shield's state, activating or deactivating it as needed.

    • getNextMove

      private int getNextMove()
      Gets the next vertical move based on the movement pattern.
      返回:
      The vertical velocity for the next move

    • bossFiresInCurrentFrame

      private boolean bossFiresInCurrentFrame()
      Checks if the Boss should fire projectiles in the current frame.
      返回:
      true if the Boss should fire, false otherwise

    • getProjectileInitialPosition

      private double getProjectileInitialPosition()
      Gets the initial Y position for projectiles.
      返回:
      The Y position offset for projectiles

    • shieldShouldBeActivated

      private boolean shieldShouldBeActivated()
      Checks if the shield should be activated based on probability.
      返回:
      true if the shield should activate, false otherwise

    • shieldExhausted

      private boolean shieldExhausted()
      Checks if the shield has been active for its maximum duration.
      返回:
      true if the shield is exhausted, false otherwise

    • activateShield

      private void activateShield()
      Activates the Boss's shield.

    • deactivateShield

      private void deactivateShield()
      Deactivates the Boss's shield.
